mapper.insert: insert into tbl_food (name, date, security, food_type, number, measure) values (#{name}, #{date}, #{security}, #{foodType}, #{number}, #{measure})
mapper.update: update tbl_food set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
update tbl_food set used_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
update tbl_food set name = #{name}, date = #{date}, security = #{security}, food_type = #{foodType}, number = #{number}, measure = #{measure} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, date, security, food_type, number, measure from tbl_food where delete_flag != 1 and used_flag != 1 limit #{start}, #{end}
select id, name, date, security, food_type, number, measure from tbl_food where date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and delete_flag != 1 and used_flag != 1 limit #{start}, #{end}
